name: Dinomite.io
description:
Enter the Jurassic era and face other Dinosaurs in a fierce battle for survival.

- Blast away other dinosaurs with your bombs.
- Eat everything in sight to grow bigger!
- Dominate your foes to become the largest in the arena.
- Boost to evade danger and escape from opponent bombs.

This game is currently in Beta, and we have tons of improvements and features still to come. Please help us out by sending us your feedback.
